mobile_app_desktop_text: Установи мобильное приложение и получи 10 лотерейных билетов и 1000 Satoshi.
pwa-instruction_desc_step_1: If you are in any other browser, open this page in the Safari browser
pwa-instruction_desc_step_2: Tap on the "Share" icon in the menu at the bottom of the screen. A dialog box will open.
pwa-instruction_desc_step_3: Tap on the item "On the Home screen", and click "Finish"
